headline.main: GM Says Opel Sale Will Provide $2 Billion for Share Buybacks
headline.print_headline: GM Says Opel Sale Will Provide $2 Billion for Share Buybacks

lead_paragraph: General Motors Co said the sale of its European Opel and Vauxhall operations will free $2 billion to accelerate planned share repurchases.
snippet: General Motors Co said the sale of its European Opel and Vauxhall operations will free $2 billion to accelerate planned share repurchases....
